hero.name: Md Moniruzaman
hero.title: R&D Manager | Embedded Systems & IoT Expert
hero.subtitle: Transforming Ideas into Smart, Scalable Products

about.title: About Me
about.heading: Passionate about building impactful technology solutions
description: As Manager of R&D at SARBS Communications Ltd., I lead innovative projects that bridge the gap between cutting-edge technology and real-world applications. With over 8 years of experience in embedded systems and IoT product development, I specialize in creating smart, scalable solutions for telecom, energy, and industrial automation sectors.

My journey in technology is driven by a passion for innovation and a commitment to excellence. I believe in the power of embedded systems and IoT to transform industries and improve lives, and I'm dedicated to pushing the boundaries of what's possible in this rapidly evolving field.

highlights.title: 8+ Years Experience
highlights.description: Leading teams in embedded systems and IoT development

highlights.title: Innovation Focus
highlights.description: Transforming complex ideas into market-ready products

skills.title: Technical Skills
skills.subtitle: Comprehensive expertise in embedded systems, IoT development, and cutting-edge technologies

experience.title: Professional Experience
experience.subtitle: A journey of innovation, leadership, and technical excellence in embedded systems and IoT development

experiences.title: Manager, R&D
experiences.description: Leading research and development initiatives for next-generation telecom and IoT solutions. Managing cross-functional teams to deliver innovative products from concept to market.
achievements: Led development of 5+ IoT products generating $2M+ in revenue
Established R&D processes reducing product development time by 40%
Built and managed a team of 12 engineers and researchers
Secured 3 patents for innovative embedded system designs

experiences.title: Lead Engineer & Consultant
experiences.description: Provided technical leadership and consulting services for embedded systems projects. Specialized in IoT solutions for industrial automation and smart city applications.
achievements: Reduced client development costs by 30% through optimized solutions
Mentored junior engineers in embedded systems design
Established partnerships with 5 major technology vendors

education.title: Education
education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Energy Science & Engineering
education.description: Specialized in energy systems, renewable technologies, and engineering fundamentals. Developed strong analytical and problem-solving skills that form the foundation of my approach to embedded systems and IoT product development.
achievements: Final Year Project on Smart Grid Systems

certifications.title: Embedded Systems Design
certifications.description: Advanced certification covering microcontroller programming, real-time systems, and hardware-software integration.

certifications.title: IoT Architecture & Security
certifications.description: Comprehensive training on IoT system design, security protocols, and cloud integration for industrial applications.

certifications.title: Project Management Professional
certifications.description: Professional certification in project management methodologies, team leadership, and product development lifecycle.
